about_the_game:
Play as a national secret agent blessed with extraordinary abilities designed to face disaster events. Entrusted with the crucial task of saving the nation's vital assets, you must navigate dangerous situations and make split-second decisions to ensure mission success. Equipped with special tools, you must confront perilous environments, using your skills to overcome obstacles and fulfill your duty.



Your mission unfolds against the backdrop of a city plunged into turmoil by a devastating disaster. As a national secret agent, you are thrust into the heart of the crisis, where molten lava courses through the streets, threatening to engulf everything in its path. With agility and precision, you must traverse the urban landscape, leaping across buildings to evade the relentless flow of magma. Amidst this perilous environment, your objective is clear: procure vital national assets and retrieve classified documents crucial for the nation's security and stability.



As the intensity of the disaster escalates, your role as a national secret agent becomes even more vital. With the essential items and documents secured, the next phase of your mission begins. Maneuvering an evacuation vehicle through the debris-laden streets, you must navigate obstacles and hazards while racing against the clock to reach the safety of the designated zone.



Disaster Slayer offers numerous key features and content to ensure an immersive gaming adventure:
1. Navigate between buildings with parkour abilities.
2. Drive to the Safety Zone.
3. Experience an apocalyptic environment.
4. Enjoy a linear game design.

As for the content:
1. Collect various items.
2. Utilize 3 types of cars.
3. Embark on 20 challenging missions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 / Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i7 7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Be a national secret agent with special abilities to face disasters. Leap across buildings to avoid lava in a disaster-stricken city. Procure vital national assets and classified documents. Drive an evacuation vehicle through debris-filled streets to reach the safe zone.
